description:
Jeanne Euphoria of the Gran Chaos Empire is sent to Van to deal with the occupation. Roroa observes the newfound freedom of the citizens of Van. Poncho locates a source of food for the impoverished citizens. Souma, Juna and Tomoe enjoy a day off together.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Hyakusenhyakushou wa Zen no Zen Naru Mono ni Arazu
In 100 Schlachten Siege zu erringen ist nicht der Inbegriff des Könnens
Mieux vaut subjuger l`ennemi sans donner bataille
To Fight and Conquer in All Our Battles Is Not Supreme Excellence
百戦百勝は善の善なる者に非ず
